This trip puts you in the heart of the action, with premium behind the goal match tickets and quality accommodation. Feel the energy of the crowd, witness football history in the making, and explore the host city with fellow fans from around the world. Whether you’re a lifelong supporter or a sports enthusiast, this is the trip every football lover dreams of. PACKAGE INCLUSIONS: Enjoy a guaranteed 3-night stay in select 3 star hotels in prime locations in either Boston, Los Angles, Kansas City or Miami! Daily Breakfast Seamless match day transfers with designated motorcoach pickup points for each game Match Day Ticket to one Quarter Final game in your chosen city (Behind the Goals) Dedicated on-site support with hotel hosts, transfer coordinators, and match day assistance throughout your stay All taxes and fees included. SEATS BEHIND THE GOAL VIEW LAND PACKAGE (NZD): 3 ★ DOUBLE/TWIN SHARE - FROM $5,369pp 3 ★ SINGLE - FROM $7,169pp 4 ★ DOUBLE/TWIN SHARE - FROM $5,700pp 4 ★ SINGLE - FROM $7,999pp Package Travel Dates: Between JULY 9th - JULY 11th Sales valid for a limited time only! Speak to your local Helloworld Travel Professional today for more information, 3 Nights fr $5,369* Enquire More Deals *Terms and Conditions Product pricing is dynamic and is correct at time of print. Prices may be subject to change based on availability at time of booking. *Packages do not include international or domestic flights. * Prices are in NZD * To allow flexibility, our package Itinerary does not include city to city transfers. *A complete itinerary, including exact nights for cities will be provided after the official tournament draw in December 2025. It is our policy to present the cost of our packages inclusive of all airport and government charges. Please accept however that these charges are not within our control, therefore we reserve the right to pass on any increase. Exchange rate fluctuations are closely monitored however re reserve the right to revise package prices at any time. Credit card payments will incur a surcharge. A deposit of 50% per person is required to secure your booking. The remaining balance of payment is required on or before 01 December 2025. As all payments are non-refundable, we strongly recommend travel insurance. All 2026 World Cup Football Packages are booked through Williment Travel, see your Helloworld Travel Professional for full details and more information.
